Workflow designed to work with the "Mojave Alfred Accented Themes" collection : https://github.com/AlexMartinFR/mojave-alfred-accented-themes

Commands list:
- theme Toggles between Dark and Light mode.
- theme blue - theme purple - theme pink - theme red - theme orange - theme yellow - theme green - theme gray Switch your actual theme to the selected accent color.

This workflow reads the actual theme's background color to deduce your actual Accent Color. If you don't use the "Mojave Alfred Accented Themes" collection, you can still edit the background colors lookup table to adapt to similar themes.
I basically used the hue in the window's background color as an identifier for your actual Accent Color.
